TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NativeActivityUpdateMapMetadata extends System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.UpdateMapMetadata

summary.span: 表示原生活動更新對應中繼資料。

span.span: Represents native activity update map metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別支援 Windows Workflow Foundation 的版本控制和動態更新功能。This class supports the versioning and dynamic update functionality of Windows Workflow Foundation. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 工作流程版本控制、工作流程識別和動態更新，請參閱下列主題。 workflow versioning, workflow identity, and dynamic update, see the following topics. [工作流程版本控制Workflow Versioning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=271561) 描述 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 中引入的工作流程版本控制功能。Describes the workflow versioning functionality introduced in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. [動態更新Dynamic Update](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271563) 描述如何使用動態更新，為保存的工作流程執行個體更新工作流程定義。Describes how to update the workflow definition of a persisted workflow instance by using dynamic update. [使用 WorkflowApplication 識別與版本控制Using WorkflowApplication Identity and Versioning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271564) 描述如何使用 裝載工作流程並存的多個版本。Describes how to use to host multiple versions of a workflow side-by-side. [WorkflowServiceHost 中的並存版本控制Side by Side Versioning in WorkflowServiceHost](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271565) 描述如何在單一端點上裝載工作流程的多個版本。Describes how to host multiple versions of a workflow on a single endpoint. [如何：並存裝載工作流程的多個版本How to: Host Multiple Versions of a Workflow Side-by-Side](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271566) 此步驟[入門教學課程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570)示範如何更新工作流程定義，以及裝載工作流程在同時使用舊的和新的定義。This step in the [Getting Started Tutorial](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570) demonstrates updating a workflow definition, and hosting workflows using both the old and new definition at the same time. [如何：更新執行中工作流程執行個體的定義How to: Update the Definition of a Running Workflow Instance](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271567) 此步驟[入門教學課程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570)示範如何更新持續性工作流程執行個體，以便使用新的工作流程定義。This step in the [Getting Started Tutorial](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570) demonstrates updating persisted workflow instances to use a new workflow definition.

summary.span: 表示用於儲存目前活動原始值物件。
